2024 (S.I. No. 103 of 2024).

title: section 16 of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011) (as adapted by the
heading: 3. Article 14(3) of the Principal Scheme is amended by substituting the
text_raw:
3. Article 14(3) of the Principal Scheme is amended by substituting the 

following subparagraph for subparagraph (k): 

“(k) Adoption Maintenance Allowance; 

(l) DABS/P-TECH NEIC bursary.”

title: section 16 of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011) (as adapted by the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of this Scheme is to amend the Student Grant Scheme 2024 to 
provide for changes to the rate of the Student Contribution Element and the 
Postgraduate Fee Contribution and the inclusion of DABS/P-TECH NEIC 
bursary as (1) an income disregard to the scheme and (2) to the list of bursaries 
from public funds that a student can hold while also receiving grant funding.
